titles.title: Diabetes Foot Disease Prevention Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under part B of Medicare for therapeutic shoes furnished to individuals with severe diabetic foot disease.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Diabetes Foot Disease Prevention Act - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of the Medicare program for therapeutic shoes furnished to individuals with severe diabetic foot disease.
